title: javascript
content:
I can not get into my msn/outlook email. I keep getting an error: not loading javascript.


I must get in email from my desktop.

please help me. Microsoft did send to you a ticket # 1038412429
creator: hazel1216

title: Firefox clears cookies when opening program.
content:
As the title explains, Firefox clears my cookies whenever i open it. not when i close it, but when i open.

the option to clear cookies on close is off, i have no clue why it's doing this, i know it's not an extension or a program. ( at least i hope it's not )

thankfully it always makes a backup but i really don't want to have to through the files and remove the .bak every single time i wanna go through the internet. any advice?
creator: thenapkinexperiencelolz

title: Does firefox have any restriction on height?
content: I am trying to give height more than 8 digits and and i hover over element using inspect its showing widthx0, upto 8 digit is working fine. Please help me in this issue, or a explanation why its happening like that
creator: jeet.deol9433

title: firefox keeps logging me out of google and google is being an ass
content: Basically because I live in Puerto Rico, the push updates and texts are wonky for some reason, so it makes the 2 factor identification really hard. I recently got a new laptop and for some reason ever since then firefox keeps signing me out whenever I restart the computer. It's a big pain because of the puerto rico issues I have to temp undo the 2 factor thing... Which as a company who likes security... I'm sure you can appreciate how much of a pain this is. I'm super sure it's a dumb fix, but how can I make it so google doesn't sign out of firefox specifically everytime I restart my laptop please???
creator: concerned.biologist.1

title: I cant find my bookmarks and saved passwords.
content: My laptop crashed. I got a new one but I cannot remember what my login info is for firefox. I had lots of saved passwords and bookmarks that I need to get back. I tried the two email addresses that I would have used and neither of them can access my old passwords and bookmarks. In fact, with either login I used I get the same saved passwords and the same bookmarks.
creator: bullseyedisc
